mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.sex AS "sex", a.phone AS "phone", a.email AS "email", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.source AS "source", a.station_id AS "stationId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_info( id, name, sex, phone, email, org_id, source, station_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{orgId}, #{source}, #{stationId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE customer_info SET name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, org_id = #{orgId}, source = #{source}, station_id = #{stationId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.type AS "type", a.province_code AS "provinceCode", a.city_code AS "cityCode", a.area_code AS "areaCode", a.placename AS "placename", a.address AS "address", a.service_point AS "servicePoint" FROM basic_service_station a WHERE a.org_id = #{id} AND a.del_flag = '0' AND a.is_useable = 'yes'

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.sex AS "sex", a.phone AS "phone", a.email AS "email", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.source AS "source", a.station_id AS "stationId" FROM customer_info a WHERE a.phone = #{phone} AND a.org_id = #{orgId} AND a.source = #{source} AND a.del_flag = '0'

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.sex AS "sex", a.phone AS "phone", a.email AS "email", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.source AS "source", a.station_id AS "stationId" FROM customer_info a WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.customer_id AS "customerId", a.address_name AS "addressName", a.address_phone AS "addressPhone", a.placename AS "placename", CONCAT(IFNULL(t1.name,''),IFNULL(t2.name,''),IFNULL(t3.name,''),IFNULL(a.placename,''),IFNULL(a.detail_address,'')) AS "detailAddress", a.addr_longitude AS "addrLongitude", a.addr_latitude AS "addrLatitude", a.default_type AS "defaultType" FROM customer_address a LEFT JOIN sys_area t1 ON a.province_code = t1.code LEFT JOIN sys_area t2 ON a.city_code = t2.code LEFT JOIN sys_area t3 ON a.area_code = t3.code WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.customer_id = #{id}
SELECT a.id AS "id",a.name AS "name" from basic_service_station a WHERE a.org_id = #{orgId} AND a.is_useable = 'yes' AND a.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
